name: Barrel Stirrer / Lees Stirrer
description:
Curved Swivel-Paddle Barrel Stirrer 

Barrel Stirrer for sur lie battonage. Winemaking tool.

We have been making these lees stirrers for over ten years!

Constructed from 304 Stainless Steel.
Approximately 32" overall length
The handle is 1" solid stainless round bar.
Extra heavy at the bung guard.

Contact us first for international shipping.

name: Panic Table

Panic Table


Available in Black textured powdercoat.

name: House Box
description:
House Box

Sold out. The House Box is an iconic design for receiving snail mail. This design would look great in front of an ultra-modern home or seaside cottage. Easy to install and use, it will last for generations to come. Made from 14 gauge Stainless Steel (2 to 3 times stronger than mass produced options), it wont rust or yield to abuse. Mail is delivered through the front slot and retrieved through the door on the other side. It is available with or without a flag. Outgoing mail is placed in between the receiving door and the mail slot plate. There are two post options as well, a standard duty brushed stainless steel model and a heavy duty mirror polished model Finally your magazines and love letters will have a happy modern home!

name: 10-13  Wallmount Mailbox
description:
Model 10-13 Modern Stainless Steel Locking Wallmount Mailbox

Sold out. The 10-13 Mailbox is a thoroughly modern design. Features: All Stainless Steel Construction. Lock is not seen from the front for a cleaner look. One-Handed mail retrieval. 12 gauge 304 grade stainless steel (At least twice as thick as many competitors, almost three times as heavy as mass produced from the big guys) Will last a lifetime even in saltwater conditions.
